name: Highway Rider - Traffic Rider
description:
Highway Rider - Traffic Rider!!!
Drive your motorbike as fast as you can, only to keep the performance to speed up in the highway. jump on your racing bike and ride in the endless busy roads and highways! make near traffic discovering 4 unique locations. never forget that riding a motorcycle can be fun, but it can also be dangerous!
Features:
-Rider motorcycle on highway
-Real traffic of moto racing
-Fast high-performance motorcycles
-Extreme 3D graphics
-Excise skills in hardcore challenges
-Tilt the phone to racing, break in danger time
